Name: decentralised_or_coe
Title: Divide and Conquer or Conquer and Divide?
Experiment: In this experiment, we compare how centralised or decentralised data science teams help organisations become more data driven. We simulate these interactions at organisations of different characteristics and evaluate the results.

Name: leadership_styles
Title: How does leadership styles effect workers in Tech Firms?
Experiment: In this experiment, we compare how different leadership styles effect the productivity of tech workers, across different range of organisations.

Name: family_planning
Title: Social Support in Child Rearing and Family Planning
Experiment: In this experiment, we explore the role of social support in the child rearing process, and how it affects decisions to raise a child.

Name: ai_adoption
Title: Technology Adoption in Ageing Populations
Experiment: In this experiment, we explore different policies in helping societies to increase their digital literacy and overall adoption of technology in their everyday lives.

Name: loneliness
Title: Loneliness, the Social Epidemic
Experiment: In this experiment, we explore different policies in helping societies to decrease social isolation.
